quests.title: Child of the Altar
quests.hook: A mass-sacrifice is planned in the old amphitheater to 'seal the sky'.
objectives: Choose: destroy a pylon, or retune it to open a vault
outcomes: Destroy: the Veil-storm passes; Relic scarcity rises
Retune: Eldran vault opens; Veil pressure spikes region-wide
rewards: Relic: Shard-Compass (reveals nearest Va-geometry for 1 minute/day)
Breath boon (if child saved): +1 corruption resist vs Veil this session

quests.title: The Black Harvest
quests.hook: Debtor-prisoners disappear at night; the Soul Crucible roars by dawn.
objectives: Gather proof of the Crucible’s inputs
Confront or bargain with the Runebearer in charge
outcomes: Expose: public riot, short-term shutdown, Veil leak in mines
rewards: Soul-Metal Buckler (+5 vs Veil effects, dents on Breath contact)

quests.title: The First Thorn
quests.hook: Elven hunters seek the Thorn that first tempted Eve, now grown into a living briar.
objectives: Track the elven coterie through the bleeding wood
Parley with brine-witches for safe mire-crossing
Decide the Thorn’s fate: burn, bind, or bear it
outcomes: Burn: elves turn to open raids; local corruption dips
Bind: craft a one-use anti-corruption rite; risk backlash
Bear: wielder gains Veil ward and whispers
rewards: Thorn-Twine Fetish (consume to halve corruption once)
Moon-brine Charm (advantage vs drowning, disadvantage vs fire)

quests.title: Blade in the Crescent
quests.hook: Emir Zulfiqar hunts a shard that makes the sand obey.
objectives: Shadow a raiding column to a brass altar
Sabotage the branding rite or turn it upon its masters
outcomes: Stop the rite: caravan dissolves; slaves flee into dunes
Reverse the rite: a sand-djinn is bound, then bargains
rewards: Crescent-Brand (once per day: create Difficult Terrain of sand)
Djinn’s Favor (one impossible crossing, one terrible rumor)

quests.title: The Ogre Who Would Be King
quests.hook: An ogre warlord dreams in Va-geometry and calls a horde.
objectives: Enter the scrap-fortress without triggering a stampede
Discover who seeds the warlord’s dreams
End the dream: smash the vat-core or sever the whisper
outcomes: Smash: horde breaks; scattered ogres imprint on closest leader
Sever: warlord becomes lucid, remembers he was a boy
rewards: Vat-Core Fragment (power source for ancient devices)
Ogre Oath (one ogre ally follows for a single battle)
